body: 1.    should be a directory in PSL 2.    should expand to  home <username> 3. vi   <filename> should open a file, given a valid filename 4. cd   <directory> should open a directory, given a valid directory 5. cd   .. should navigate to the  home  directory  Though technically a Bash feature, this actually is supported in PowerShell on Windows, and so should also be supported in PSL.  PH  This seems to be a default configuration issue  PSConsoleSample  cd   cd   Home location for this provider is not set. To set the home location, call   get psprovider 'FileSystem' .Home = 'path' .
